name: 伊莱恩·瓦尔德斯
name_full: 伊莱恩·瓦尔德斯 Elaine Valdes
introduction: Elaine Valdés is a Cuban-American film, TV, theatre, and VO actor originally from Miami, Florida. After graduating from NYU's Tisch School of the Arts with a BFA in Drama (Stella Adler and Stonestreet Studios), Elaine has worked in various productions across all mediums. Additionally, she has trained in a Commedia Dell'Arte program in Florence, Italy, as well as Improv courses at Upright Citizen's Brigade in NYC.
